text: The Road to Babel (Spanish:El camino de Babel) is a 1945 Spanish comedy film directed by Jerónimo Mihura and starring Alfredo Mayo, Guillermina Grin and Fernando Fernán Gómez. Its style was close to that of a screwball comedy.Labanyi & Pavlović p.196 ==Cast== * Alfredo Mayo as César Jiménez * Guillermina Grin as Laura * Fernando Fernán Gómez as Marcelino Pastor * Mary Lamar as Elena * Miguel del Castillo as Arturo * Tita Gracia as Encarnación * Nicolás D.
